text: Gei digaula ga hagau nadau gau kae hegau gi Shiloh belee hula e gaamai Tebedebe o di Hagababa o Dimaadua di Gowaa Aamua, dela e hai dono lohongo i mehanga nia ada manu e lua hai ono bakau. Gei nia dama daane Eli dogolua go Hophni mo Phinehas e loomoi madalia Tebedebe o di Hagababa deelaa.4.4 Exodus 25.22
